name: x-sp-def-6
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Special Defense by six stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises Special Defense by six stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.black_white: It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
